Metadata.Name: NEICE - ICPC IEPD
Metadata.Summary: System to exchange ICPC case information to be exchanged between SACWIS / Child Welfare systems of 2 states
Metadata.Description: TThe NEICE ICPC Case IEPD facilitates cross jurisdictional information sharing between the Child Welfare agencies of states. This data exchange allows the Receiving State (state receiving the child) to obtain information required to evaluate the placement and let the Sending (agency sending the child) agency whether it is fine to transfer the child across state lines.
Metadata.Keywords: ICPC, Interstate Child Placement, CB, ACF, HHS
Metadata.Sponsors: Children's Bureau, Administration for Children and Families, HHS

Organization.Name: Children's Bureau, Administration for Children and Families, HHS
